articles.author: Emily Craig Senior
articles.title: Scientific breakthrough could defuse breast cancer 'time bomb' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Around 44,000 Brits and 210,000 Americans are diagnosed with the most common type of breast cancer - oestrogen receptor positive (ER+) - every year.
articles.content:
Researchers have discovered why breast cancer cells that have spread to the lungs may wake up following years of sleep and form incurable tumours.

articles.title: Lawmakers call for Mexico travel advisory over reported counterfeit drug sales - The Hill
